about_the_game:
A 5E Mini-Dungeon for 4 Characters of Level 9–11


The party is sent to retrieve the soul of Prince Remlek, which has been located in a hidden underground complex, accessible from the sewers. A devourer holds the soul and while trying to come back to this plane to get a more powerful soul, became trapped underground.

5E Mini-Dungeons are small adventures for 5th Edition which are setting agnostic and are easily inserted anywhere in your campaign.

Requires: A Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license or an active subscription and the included 5E Ruleset.
